lead_paragraph: MILLER WOLFF--Hannah. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Hannah Miller Wolff, a committed philanthropist whose devotion to the Jewish community lives on in her family. We extend our condolences to Hannah's brother, George Miller (Roslyn); her children, Linda Wolff-Adler, Marge Carty, and Richard Wolff; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MILLER WOLFF, HANNAH

snippet: MILLER WOLFF--Hannah. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Hannah Miller Wolff, a committed philanthropist whose devotion to the Jewish community lives on in her family. We extend our condolences to Hannah's brother, George Miller (Roslyn); her children, Linda Wolff-Adler, Marge Carty, and Richard Wolff; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
